SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.vulkan

Class VKCapabilitiesInstance

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.vulkan.VKCapabilitiesInstance
public class VKCapabilitiesInstance extends Object
Defines the enabled capabilities of a Vulkan VkInstance.
